TEXT.English: Danalin, God of the seas is dreaming... Of what was lost, of beloved children, of joyful laughter, of endless potential... Of despair, of pain, of death...

These beautiful water nymphs dwell in remote ponds. The good ones are extremely shy and hide for those who pass by their pools. Many of the Undines have gone mad and try to lure men into their pools for a lethal, watery kis
TEXT.French: These beautiful water nymphs dwell in remote ponds. The good ones are extremely shy and hide for those who pass by their pools. Many of the Undines have gone mad and try to lure men into their pools for a lethal, watery kis

TEXT.Spanish: These beautiful water nymphs dwell in remote ponds. The good ones are extremely shy and hide for those who pass by their pools. Many of the Undines have gone mad and try to lure men into their pools for a lethal, watery kis

TEXT.English: Able to gift waterwalking to neutral or hostile targets, luring them into the waves where they will suffer heavy penalties from [LINK=PROMOTION_ICANTSWIM]I cant swim![\LINK]
TEXT.French: Able to gift waterwalking to neutral or hostile targets, luring them into the waves where they will suffer heavy penalties from [LINK=PROMOTION_ICANTSWIM]I cant swim![\LINK]

TEXT.Spanish: Able to gift waterwalking to neutral or hostile targets, luring them into the waves where they will suffer heavy penalties from [LINK=PROMOTION_ICANTSWIM]I cant swim![\LINK]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Lure your enemies into the waves and attack them as they drown!
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Lure your enemies into the waves and attack them as they drown!
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Lure your enemies into the waves and attack them as they drown!
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Lure your enemies into the waves and attack them as they drown!
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Lure your enemies into the waves and attack them as they drown!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Causes a single neutral or enemy unit to be disguised as one of the horrors of the dream, marking them for attack.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Causes a single neutral or enemy unit to be disguised as one of the horrors of the dream, marking them for attack.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Causes a single neutral or enemy unit to be disguised as one of the horrors of the dream, marking them for attack.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Causes a single neutral or enemy unit to be disguised as one of the horrors of the dream, marking them for attack.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Causes a single neutral or enemy unit to be disguised as one of the horrors of the dream, marking them for attack.

TEXT.English: When we dream, we focus on what is right in front of us, in clear and detailed hallucinations. But what about the scenery? The crowd passing by on the street, the servant dusting the bookshelves or the children playing in the street, they have no clear or memorable form; they are just there.
TEXT.French: When we dream, we focus on what is right in front of us, in clear and detailed hallucinations. But what about the scenery? The crowd passing by on the street, the servant dusting the bookshelves or the children playing in the street, they have no clear or memorable form; they are just there.
TEXT.German: When we dream, we focus on what is right in front of us, in clear and detailed hallucinations. But what about the scenery? The crowd passing by on the street, the servant dusting the bookshelves or the children playing in the street, they have no clear or memorable form; they are just there.
TEXT.Italian: When we dream, we focus on what is right in front of us, in clear and detailed hallucinations. But what about the scenery? The crowd passing by on the street, the servant dusting the bookshelves or the children playing in the street, they have no clear or memorable form; they are just there.
TEXT.Spanish: When we dream, we focus on what is right in front of us, in clear and detailed hallucinations. But what about the scenery? The crowd passing by on the street, the servant dusting the bookshelves or the children playing in the street, they have no clear or memorable form; they are just there.
